docs.text: Styles: update geom_obs symbologie Algorithm: define default value for parameter feature source

Add algorithm load PostGIS layers Add postgis database algorithm Add create geom obs and segments algorithms Add import dstv algorithm Add import manholes layer algorithm Add config project algorithm Add first algorithm create geopackage algorithm

Installation # The plugin is not yet available in the official QGIS repository , you must install it manually. Custom repository # We recommend adding the QGIS custom repository , using this URL : 1 https://github.com/3liz/qgis_drain_sewer_visual_inspection/releases/latest/download/plugins.xml There isn't any authentification, and you will have automatic updates later. Manual ZIP # If you don't want to set up a custom repository, you can download the ZIP file from the release page
